targets.rawSql:
SELECT
        v.region_name AS region_name,
        COUNT(v.id) AS total
FROM aws_vpc AS v
WHERE account_id IN ($aws_account)
GROUP BY v.region_name
ORDER BY total DESC;

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM aws_vpc
WHERE account_id IN ($aws_account);

SELECT
        region_name,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM aws_az 
WHERE account_id IN ($aws_account)
GROUP BY region_name ORDER BY total DESC;

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM aws_az
WHERE account_id IN ($aws_account);

SELECT
        instance_type,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM aws_instance
WHERE account_id IN ($aws_account)
GROUP BY instance_type ORDER BY total DESC;

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM aws_instance
WHERE account_id IN ($aws_account);

SELECT
        v.region_name AS region_name,
        COUNT(i.id) AS instances
FROM aws_vpc AS v
INNER JOIN aws_instance AS i ON v.vpc_id = i.vpc_id AND i.account_id = v.account_id
WHERE i.account_id IN ($aws_account)
GROUP BY v.region_name

SELECT
        arch,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM aws_instance
WHERE account_id IN ($aws_account)
GROUP BY arch ORDER BY total DESC;

SELECT
        v.region_name AS region_name,
        COUNT(s.id) AS subnets
FROM aws_vpc AS v
INNER JOIN aws_subnet AS s ON v.vpc_id = s.vpc_id AND v.account_id = s.account_id
WHERE s.account_id IN ($aws_account)
GROUP BY v.region_name

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM aws_subnet
WHERE account_id IN ($aws_account);

SELECT
        b.region_name AS region_name,
        COUNT(b.id) AS buckets
FROM aws_bucket AS b
WHERE b.account_id IN ($aws_account)
GROUP BY region_name

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM aws_bucket
WHERE account_id IN ($aws_account);

SELECT
        region_name,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM aws_image
WHERE account_id IN ($aws_account)
GROUP BY region_name

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM aws_image
WHERE account_id IN ($aws_account);

SELECT
        type,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM aws_loadbalancer
WHERE account_id IN ($aws_account)
GROUP BY type;

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM aws_loadbalancer
WHERE account_id IN ($aws_account);

SELECT
        region_name,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM aws_loadbalancer
WHERE account_id IN ($aws_account)
GROUP BY region_name;

SELECT
        region_name,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM aws_net_interface
WHERE account_id IN ($aws_account)
GROUP BY region_name
ORDER BY total DESC

SELECT
        interface_type,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM aws_net_interface
WHERE account_id IN ($aws_account)
GROUP BY interface_type;

SELECT COUNT(id) FROM aws_net_interface
WHERE account_id IN ($aws_account);

SELECT
        region_name,
        COUNT(id) AS total
FROM aws_net_interface
WHERE public_ip_address <> '' AND account_id IN ($aws_account)
GROUP BY region_name

panels.title: AWS Public IPv4 Addresses by Region

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM aws_net_interface
WHERE public_ip_address <> '' AND account_id IN ($aws_account);

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM aws_orphan_dns_record 
WHERE account_id IN ($aws_account);
